code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL="http://localhost:5001/api";export const getCompositionsCount=async ensembleId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(ensembleId,"/compositions-count"));return response.data;};export const getEnsembleAlbums=async ensembleId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(ensembleId,"/albums"));return response.data;};export const getTopSellingAlbums=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/top-selling"));return response.data;};export const createEnsemble=async ensembleData=>{try{const response=await axios.post(API_URL,ensembleData);return response.data;}catch(error){var _error$response;console.error('Error creating ensemble:',((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.data)||error.message);throw error;}};
